attributes.action: Reduce Council tax for small bisinesses for a year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Small businesses are suffering nation wide. Business owners just cannot cope with taxes and utility bills decreasing takings. Among taxes, council tax hits high of all in many areas of UK. Small businesses need Government back up for survival. It would be a great help if the Central government requests local governments to offer tax rebate during recession period.If small businesses keep closing at an alarming rate and the owners and their employees willad up to unemployment figure and already long queue for job seekers' allownce.

rejection.details: Please contact your Council with your concerns. The PM and Government do not have authority over local councils.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
